description:
My place is nestled in the historic Mott Haven District, close to 6 Subway Line, Charlie' s Bar and Kitchen, La Morada Restaurant, Filtered Coffee, The Piano District, Mott Haven Bar and Grill.  You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, including a gorgeous private garden. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

A beautiful queen sized one bedroom with queen sized sofa bed in the living room. A very peaceful garden apartment, recently renovated, large open plan living room. Amenities include, washer and dryer, dishwasher, hi-speed wi-fi, air conditioning, double shower, and HUGE decked backyard, with BBQ, smoker, beautiful patio furniture, and a lush plant and flower life to marvel at.

The whole apartment.

If not here, by phone. Also, neighbors are close to me and always available to answer questions if I'm unavailable.

The premier up and coming neighborhood in NYC. The south Bronx is back! Mott Haven historic district, the birthplace of hip hop, sports trendy coffee shops, restaurants with the true grit and attitude of authentic New York. The apartment is tucked away on a quiet block.

1 block away from the 6 train, 20 min from union Square
name: SPACIOUS 2 BED w GARDEN 5min to MANHATTAN
review: I stayed at Misha's place with three of my friends. Even while his traveling, he responded very quickly for any of my questions. His place was very clean and comfortable. Sofa bed was big enough for two people to sleep. Also his neighbors were so kind that they helped us a lot. It was less than 30 minutes to go to most areas in Manhattan. Thank you for accepting my request, Misha :)
